problem: No weld current measured despite Voltage delivery
error message: No current fault No readings in spite of requirement (program <no.>)
symptom short: weld current not detected during operation
symptom detailed: control unit delivers Voltage, but No weld current is registered.
May be Intermittent or consistent depending on contact and setup.
observable signs: gun May remain open during Cycle
Possible Root Causes: Bad Electrode contact due to adhesive or contamination
Damaged cable or connector to current measuring coil
Insufficient squeeze time (gun not fully closed)
Most Probable Cause: Electrode contact failure due to contamination or poor fit

Quick Initial Checks: Inspect Electrode surfaces for dirt or adhesive
Confirm gun closure and squeeze time settings
Troubleshoot Procedure: 1. Electrodes: Exchange or mill to restore contact
Cables & Connectors: Inspect and replace if damaged
Part Fit: Verify alignment and contact
Squeeze Time: Adjust parameters to ensure full closure

problem: Welding process interrupted due to Voltage tolerance breach
symptom detailed: Frequency: Intermittent, especially during short-circuit welds
Severity: Moderate to critical (causes line stop
Impact: Interrupts production, requires manual reset or inspection
observable signs: No visible arc or weld formation
Possible low Voltage readings at gun
No material present during weld attempt
Possible Root Causes: Electrical: Damaged measuring line, low Electrode Voltage
Software: Voltage tolerance Parameters set too narrow
Human Error: Welding attempted without material
Most Probable Cause: Voltage tolerance range too low or Damaged measuring line at Welding gun

Quick Initial Checks: Verify power supply and Voltage stability
Inspect cables, plugs, and measuring line for damage
attempt System reset and re-run with material
Troubleshoot Procedure: Check voltage tolerance settings in the program
Inspect welding gunâ€™s measuring line and connections
Confirm material is present during weld cycle
Run diagnostics to verify sensor and actuator health
Adjust parameters and test with material under normal conditions
